TopicTitle: game changing to map and freezing when changing the name of a craft.

Articles.Content: This morning when I was making a plane I went to rename the craft, about half what through typing the game switched to the map with the icons you get when you are flying a craft such as the kerbal view in the top right corner. The game also froze and played the space center menu's music. I had to alt-F4 to get the game to work again. anyone else encounter this?

your craft name had an "m" in it, right?

Patch one notes said they fixed that, but I've had it happen since also.

It seems to be connected to something else happening during game play, but I haven't been able to figure out what.

After I reloaded, I was able to change the name without interference.

Were you?
